CHOOSE_CONNECTION:
Choose your connection 
 'r' for RMI 
 's' for Socket 
 'd' for Default
INSERT_NAME_AGAIN: Please insert your user Name again
NO_SERVER_LISTENING:
No server listening on given ip.
 Please insert new one
MENU_WAITING:
You are waiting, what you want to do: 
 w - see your window card 
 o - see window card of another player 
 d - see draft 
 p - see public objectives 
 q - see your private objective 
 t - see tool cards 
 f - see how many favor points you have left
ASK_USER: Insert the name of the user whom you want to see the window card between these:
MENU_PLAYING:
What move do you want to make: 
 p - place a dice from the draft 
 t - use a tool card 
 q - pass turn
ALREADY_DONE: You have already done this action
